member.name: T:Log.Logger
member.summary: The Logger Class to handle Logger's or write simpli text to a file or just read from a text file and output it into a command shell

member.name: M:Log.Logger.WriteLine(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Write Text to a Log file
member.param: Determine wether to use Date and Time for the Text string to be writen

member.name: M:Log.Logger.ReadLine(System.String)
member.summary: Read Text from a File and Output it in a Command Prompt
